K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-1: a'arya sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishth'a da hri da ya gu hya dh'a tu ka randa n'a ma dh'a ra ni mah'a ya na s'u tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-3: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsral gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-7: bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dha na dri ma med pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-8: rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-10: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-20: mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-21: yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-22: mdun du byas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:504b-23: de nas 'khor gyi nang de nas bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu mkhas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-4: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-5: dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhi ga yod de; de yang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-7: sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-12: yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-13: de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-14: bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-15: bdug pas mngon par mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-16: na bza' rin 'bum ri ba yang gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-17: bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te; bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-19: sras kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505a-20: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad pa ci gnang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri @505b med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-1: ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-2: de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-3: des rings pa rings par rang gi kyim du song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-4: de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-7: zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-8: gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-10: bdug pa khyer te 'khor mja po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-12: pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-15: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-16: bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus tshod la bab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-17: bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-19: nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-20: 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:505b-21: deng don chen por mdzad par 'gyur gyi tshur shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-2: bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-4: 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-6: de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-7: bkur sti chen pos mchod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-23: rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-25: skyed mos tshal de'i nang na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-26: mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506a-31: gyo mos kun tu gang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-0: phyag dar gyi phung po @506b lta bu zhig yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-2: mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-4: gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-8: deng ni gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyed legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-11: deng khyed la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-13: yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum bskor ba nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-14: nyid kyi sku las na bza' gsil nas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-17: 'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs ba bzhin du mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:506b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang spyan mchims gang zhing bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang @507a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-2: mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po der bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-3: de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de ya mtshan chen por gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-4: yi chad de 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-5: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-8: rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-10: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-12: bshum pa'i snga ltas chen po gnga' ba gang gis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang par bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-15: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-18: ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507a-21: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi @507b gang bu ji snyed gnas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-2: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye btil gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-4: sbyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-6: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-10: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-12: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-14: de nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-15: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-16: kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-17: kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-18: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-19: kha cig gis ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:507b-20: kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-1: byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-2: kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-3: kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-4: kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-5: kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-6: kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-7: kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-8: kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-9: kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-10: kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-11: kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-12: kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-14: de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-16: phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-17: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-18: rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-19: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-21: chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-23: gang gi slad du phu dud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-24: bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-26: de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-0: @508b lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-6: dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-8: des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-11: gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo snga rnams bcang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-12: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-13: phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-14: nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-15: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:508b-16: khong du chud par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-0: rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs @509a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-4: dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-5: phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-6: lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-14: phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-25: mi ma yin pa de rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-26: sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas gcig la gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-28: mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-29: gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509a-30: 'di ni rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces @509b gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-2: 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gnga' bar bgyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-5: 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-6: 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-7: rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-9: 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-10: sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-13: 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-16: phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-18: dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-21: dge 'dun 'tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par mi byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-23: rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:509b-25: de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma @510a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-2: dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-4: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-7: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-10: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-11: mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyad dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-16: spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-17: gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510a-18: mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin @510b po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-2: dril bu g-yar ka'i dra bar sprel ba dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-5: dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-7: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-10: dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-11: sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phu dud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-12: bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-15: bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug gi bar la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-17: gnas gang na mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-18: gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:510b-19: phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-2: gnas der srog chags mi srun pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-3: gdug pas kyang mi chugs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-4: gcan zan gyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-13: sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-15: rta bla'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-16: sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-17: phyogs der yams kyi nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-25: brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-26: gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-27: rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-34: mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-35: mchod rten de mthong btsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511a-36: phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad @511b dang; skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-3: bu me'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-4: dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur; dug gis ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-8: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-9: lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-10: rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-11: rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sa phyogs de srung bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-12: yongs su skyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-13: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-16: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-19: mjug ring chen po'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-20: klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-21: legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-22: lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:511b-24: mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-2: gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-5: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-6: lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi chad par mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-7: gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-11: byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-13: gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-21: bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-29: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512a-30: phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-0: de bzhin @512b gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-1: sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-4: mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su ba skyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-5: mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-12: des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-15: rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-17: lag na rdo rje nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:512b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-0: gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @513a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-1: 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-3: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-4: de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-5: dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-6: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'an /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-7: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-8: aom bhu bi bha b'a na ba ra ba tsa too /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-16: sma ra ta th'a ga ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-19: badzra bo dhi manda aa lam k'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-23: bo dha ya bo dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-24: bo dha ni bho dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-26: sam bo dha ni sam bo dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-28: tsa lantu sarba a'a pa ra n'a ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-29: sarba p'a pam bi ga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-31: sarba sho ka bi ga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-32: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-34: sam bha ba sam bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-35: sarba ta th'a ga te guhye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-39: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-41: sa ma ya aa dhishtha te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-42: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-44: su pra tishthi ta stu pe ta th'a ga ta aa dhishthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513a-46: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aushni sha dha tu mu dr'a ni sarba ta th'a ga ta dharma dh'a tu bi bhu shi ta aa dhishthi ta hu ru hu ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-0: bcom ldan 'das @513b kyis ring bsrel za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-1: phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khri ga til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-2: sh'akya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-3: ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-4: legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-5: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-6: byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-7: gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-8: mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-9: gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rjes su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-11: thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-12: de nas gzungs bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:513b-13: ji tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing 'phang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:514a-3: bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:514a-4: bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:514a-11: lto 'phye chen po de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:514a-13: mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:514a-14: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:514a-15: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dy'a ka ra pra bha wa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-014:514a-16: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande gtsang de wendra rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o ////
